The purpose of IRM 6.273.1 Merit System Assessment was to (1) ensure fairness and equality for employees in Servicewide employment practices and decisions and adherence to Human Resources laws and regulations that strengthen the concept of merit, and (2) provide for monitoring and evaluating Service-wide trends and conditions in all HR functions and activities throughout the Service.

The material in this IRM 6.273.1 is obsolete due to administrative changes.
IRM 6.10.1, Personnel Staffing Accountability Programs, superseded part of IRM 6.273.1 as noted IRM 6.273.1, Merit System Assessment, is obsolesced.
